Uses of Package
Simulation

  • Classes in Simulation used by Simulation
    Class
    Description
    CEventList
    Event processing mechanism Events are created here and it is ensured that they are processed in the proper order The simulation clock is located here.
    CProcess
    Blueprint for processes Classes that implement this interface can process events
    Machine
    Machine in a factory
    ProductAcceptor
    Blueprint for accepting products Classes that implement this interface can accept products
    Queue
    Queue that stores products until they can be handled on a machine machine
    Sink
    A sink
    Source
    A source of products This class implements CProcess so that it can execute events.
